page.title: 08Blue Bell Motel.
page.content: The Blue Bell Motel is on the corner of Acklam Road and Ladgate Lane in Middlesbrough. It is a large brick building which has just recently been extended to provide further{accommodation.}It is a three star motel and it has been open for over twenty years. It gets its name from standing on Blue Bell Corner. The Motel is owned by the {Swallow}group and has{sixty rooms.}The rooms can be two, three or four bedded. There are two{public bars}which open at 5.30pm. and close at 10.30pm. The busiest night is Saturday and the busiest day is Monday. This motel can cater for celebrations like weddings,anniversaries, engagements and birthday parties for children.
